qas.question: Who received the first steam engine patent?
What was the nationality of Jerónimo de Ayanz y Beaumont?
In what year did Jerónimo de Ayanz y Beaumont receive a steam engine patent?
In what year did Savery patent his steam pump?
In what year did Newcomen's engine pump in a mine?
Who received the first chamber engine patent?
What was the nationality of Thomas Newcomen?
In what year did Thomas Newcomen receive a steam engine patent?
In what year did Newcomen patent his steam pump?
In what year did Savery's engine pump in a mine?

context: Using boiling water to produce mechanical motion goes back over 2000 years, but early devices were not practical. The <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><a1_3><b6_0>Spanish<b6_0/><a1_3/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> inventor <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><a0_3><b5_0>Jerónimo de Ayanz y Beaumont<b5_0/><a0_3/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> obtained the first patent for a steam engine in <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><a2_3><b7_0>1606<b7_0/><a2_3/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>. In <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><a3_3><b8_0>1698<b8_0/><a3_3/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> Thomas Savery patented a steam pump that used steam in direct contact with the water being pumped. Savery's steam pump used condensing steam to create a vacuum and draw water into a chamber, and then applied pressurized steam to further pump the water. Thomas Newcomen's atmospheric engine was the first commercial true steam engine using a piston, and was used in <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2><a4_3><b9_0>1712<b9_0/><a4_3/><a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> for pumping in a mine.
